text: @WhiteHouse @PressSec Do you know how many YEARS it will take to test Americans at this rate?? Do the math. 88,000+ Americans dead. This is the first global crisis ever where no one is even looking to the United States for leadership. https://t.co/dDhRhsBT4w  #TrumpGate
